agentData.mission: Conduct a comprehensive literature survey across algebra, calculus, geometry, probability, statistics, discrete mathematics, and mathematical modeling. Collect seminal textbooks, landmark papers, survey articles, canonical theorems with references to proofs, worked examples or exercises, and any publicly available datasets or simulation examples referenced in the literature; prioritize sources that include proofs, worked examples, and data/simulations.

results.message: Research halted: missing claim/intake fields (claim text is required).
